author: Jane Smith
title: CSS Grid vs. Flexbox
line_description: Learn when to use CSS Grid and Flexbox for layout.
content:
CSS Grid and Flexbox are both powerful layout systems in CSS. Each has its unique strengths.

### CSS Grid
CSS Grid is ideal for creating 2-dimensional layouts.

### Flexbox
Flexbox is great for 1-dimensional layouts.

You can learn more in the [CSS Grid documentation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Grid_Layout) and [Flexbox documentation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Flexible_Box_Layout).
